item.title: Coops in BGWC
item.description: Randwerk The first Berlin Games Coop (that we know of). Purple Sloth Studio The second Berlin Games Coop (that we know of). Deep Skyy Games The third Berlin Games Coop (that we know of). rooster games coop Game dev coop from the Neatherlands. stalgrad Game dev coop from the Neatherlands.
